faqs.question: Do I need special permits for a villa extension?
faqs.answer: Yes, most extensions require permits. Many service providers on Homezy assist with all regulatory approvals as part of their offering.

faqs.question: Can I extend upwards (add a floor) to my villa?
faqs.answer: That depends on zoning and structural limitations. Listed professionals will assess your property and advise on feasible extension options.
